backend/main.mo: Backend canister defining user profiles, access control, contact form submission handling, junk filtering, and reCAPTCHA configuration fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs for production deployment and verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized frontend files describing component behaviors, styles, routing, and contact form logic.
frontend/.env.production.example: Example production environment file showing how to set the public reCAPTCHA site key.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode adjustments.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file preloading the hero image and setting up DNS prefetch plus the root mount point.
frontend/PRODUCTION_CONFIGURATION.md: Documentation for configuring frontend and backend reCAPTCHA settings and required post-deployment admin steps.
frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Stub document outlining production deployment notes for Version 33.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION.md: Checklist for verifying landing page, lazy-loaded routes, contact form behavior, and access control after deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with routes for the landing page and lazily loaded offer pages, providing a router provider wrapper.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactF: Implements a contact form with validation, reCAPTCHA v3 handling, bot checks, and form submission via a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactS: Displays the contact section with location info, email details, and initializes the contact form once the section becomes visible.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Renders the site footer with branding, social media links, and a humorous site credit message.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Defines the hero section with large branding text, descriptive messaging, and call‑to‑action buttons.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes the full landing page layout including hero, offers, reviews, contact, and footer sections over a fixed background image.
frontend/src/components/landing/OffersSe: Shows a grid of tour feature cards that link to detailed offer pages using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewCa: Displays an individual review with star rating, excerpt, and reviewer name.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewsS: Renders the reviews section with a grid of curated reviews and a TripAdvisor call‑to‑action.
frontend/src/components/landing/TripAdvi: Button linking to a TripAdvisor review page with animated icon styling.
frontend/src/components/offers/GetInTouc: CTA link sending users to the home page’s contact section via hash navigation.
frontend/src/content/countryCallingCodes: Empty content file with no exports.
frontend/src/content/curatedReviews.ts: Defines a CuratedReview interface and exports an array of preset customer review objects.
frontend/src/content/offersPosts.ts: Defines OfferPost structure and exports detailed offer content, including long-form sections for tour packages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageSeo.ts: Updates document title, meta tags, Open Graph data, and optional article JSON-LD based on provided SEO config.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecaptchaV3.ts: Loads and initializes reCAPTCHA v3 on demand and exposes a method to execute actions for tokens.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollToHashSectio: Scrolls smoothly to the element matching the current URL hash on mount or hash changes.
Submits contact form data via the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for light/dark themes, base typography, and custom text-shadow utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/offers/ChooseYourOwnA: Renders the Choose Your Own Adventure offer page with SEO setup, styled layout, dynamic post content, and a CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/FlexibleAsHell: Renders the Flexible as Hell offer page using shared styling, SEO config, dynamic post content, and a CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/OffTheBeatenPa: Renders the Off the Beaten Path offer page with SEO metadata, post-driven sections, and CTA component.
frontend/src/pages/offers/PrivateAndPers: Renders the Private and Personal offer page with themed layout, SEO settings, and mapped post content.
frontend/src/pages/offers/StayYourWayPag: Renders the Stay Your Way offer page using shared offer-page structure, SEO config, and CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/StoriesAndBant: Renders the Stories and Banter offer page with SEO data, dynamic content sections, and a CTA.
frontend/src/types/recaptcha.d.ts: Declares global TypeScript definitions for window.grecaptcha with ready and execute methods.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL params (including hash routing) and storing, retrieving, or clearing them in sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s deployment state, existing features, and new feature requests for preparing Version 33 for production.
